text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a simple delicious chicken
orzo pasta with Asiago this recipe is
from my recipes calm a website today I
may be doing some work with in the
future
alright we're gonna start with some
simple chicken stock or broth I got some
homemade stuff you can use the canned
stuff for the chicken bouillon really
anything works for this bring that up to
a boil then I'm gonna add two chicken
breasts which I cubed into like 1 inch
pieces I'm a dump in my orzo pasta which
is also known as melon seed pasta
because it looks like a melon seed stir
that in and as soon as that comes back
to a simmer I'm gonna add some herbs and
spices I have some salt some pepper a
little rosemary and a little oregano all
the ingredients will be on the site as
usual alright sir that in I'm gonna
lower the flame down to like medium-low
we're gonna set our timer for 12 minutes
and we're gonna cook this so you know
once in a while I like to post a recipe
for the non the complete non cooks the
people that just can barely boil water
which is really all you got to do here
if you can boil the stock and move a
wooden spoon in a circular motion you
can make this dish okay you're gonna
stir it very often every minute or so
give it a stir and you'll notice after a
couple minutes it'll start soaking up
all that stock the pasta will start to
swell up alright after 5 or 6 minutes
it's gonna kind of look like that and by
the end of 12 minutes that pasta is
gonna be tender the liquids gonna be
pretty much gone by the way you can
always adjust with another splash of
chicken broth or stock you know if it's
getting a little dry don't be afraid to
adjust at that point I'm going to turn
off the heat I'm gonna stir in my fresh
peas which were frozen I'm gonna dump in
half the cheese the grated Asiago very
nice cheese Asiago it's kind of a
similar to a parmesan flavor kind of a
cross I would say between a parmesan and
a sharp very sharp cheddar and as soon
as that's mixed in you're ready to eat
adjust for salt and pepper of course
I'm gonna put it in a bowl I'm gonna top
with the rest of the cheese and that is
an unbelievably simple comforting tasty
delicious and incredibly easy as I said
recipe this is for you nan cooks if you
can boil water you can make this dish
and you got to be a little you know cut
up two chicken breasts but if you can't
do that you probably you know don't
ought to use a computer and you're not
even watching it so it doesn't matter so
anyway check out the site all the
ingredients are there and as always
enjoy
